Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2012 10:43PM Annejtd wrote: This is good to read! Good for me because I was about to start on my navelbine. Last week ive gone to after my xray scan the radiologist immediately send me to emergency hospital to take out the fluid in my left lungs. Then today my onco informed they changed the chemo med im taking from halaven to navelbine. So Im taking both Zometa and navelbine(1st day). Hope you could keep me posted on whats the development of the this drug to you. Im praying to God that he will use it to do wonders for me too. God bless and hope to read more of good news and good health from you. annejtd
Posts.Title: Navelbine is zapping my pleural effusions! jcb51 jcb51
